name: maxillofacial

relating to the mouth, jaw, face, and neck, or to medical treatment of this part of the body: the soft tissues of the maxillofacial region My training is in maxillofacial surgery.
More examplesFewer examplesBlair treated World War I soldiers with complex maxillofacial injuries.She will be seeing a maxillofacial surgeon in the morning.He is a specialist in maxillofacial surgery.
